text: Hey team, looking to work with Riley Evans for Sportsgirl. Budget is approx $28,885 - need 2 x Instagram post, 3 x Behind-the-scenes content, 2 x Facebook post, 1 x 60-second YouTube video, 1 x TikTok video. 11 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 7 months. Start date: December 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
